value:
$WmMPID_年明リィレ,ch11_26_Lyre_F_NewYear22,Face|Oh Captain Ranulf! Where are you?$k$p$WmMPID_年明キサ,ch11_25_Kisa_M_NewYear22,Face|Hey, get back here! That's no fair—I
only just caught my breath!$k$p$WmMPID_年明レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_NewYear22,Face|Oh, come on! Why won't you two just
get along already?$k$p$WmMPID_比翼ダグ,ch00_34_Dagr_FF_Pair,Face|Speaking of getting along, we found a
surprise for you.$k$p$nMPID_ノート味方|Yes, look who we found.$k$p$WmMPID_年明レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_NewYear22,Face|Oh, Fáfnir! You...um... I...$k$p$WmMPID_年明ファフニール,ch00_32_Fafnir_M_NewYear22,Face|Reginn. Is there something you want
to tell me?$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_02,0|$WmMPID_年明レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_NewYear22,Face|Oh, Fáfnir... Umm... That is...$k$p$WmMPID_年明ファフニール,ch00_32_Fafnir_M_NewYear22,Face|What is it? If you have something
to say, state it plainly.$k$p$WmMPID_年明レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_NewYear22,Face|I...I wanted to know if you'd go to the
shrine with me.$k$p$WmMPID_年明ファフニール,ch00_32_Fafnir_M_NewYear22,Face|Is that it? Such an ordeal for so
simple a request. Yes, I will join you.$k$p$WmMPID_年明レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_NewYear22,Face|Oh! Th-thank you!$k$pIt's been so long since we've done
something together! I'm so happy. My
New Year's wish is coming true!$k$p$Fo1500,0,0,0,255|$WmMPID_比翼ダグ,ch00_34_Dagr_FF_Pair,Face|$Fi1500|Huh. That seemed to go pretty well.$k$p$nMPID_ノート味方|I don't understand what the fuss was
about. Fáfnir is her brother—why was
she so frightened to ask him?$k$p$nMPID_比翼ダグ|Beats me. Maybe they had a fight in
whatever world they're from?$k$p$nMPID_ノート味方|I wonder... If they can get along in
this world, perhaps there's a world
where you and I get along, as well.$k$p$nMPID_比翼ダグ|What? Please. Even if that world did
exist, I'd smash it to bits just for fun!$k$p$nMPID_ノート味方|Hah! And I would help you, sister.
Shall we head to the shrine as well?$k$p$nMPID_比翼ダグ|Yeah, why not. Hey, wait up, Reginn!
We're coming too!$k$p$Sbs150|
